fullDescription.intro: RunAligner Reads a BAM or up to two fastQ or fastA files and passes them forward to one of the included aligner (e.g. BWA).
fullDescription.option: FastQ, FastA, or BAM file. The second file (FastQ or FastA) is optional (paired-end mapping).
Please choose if single-end, or paired-end mapping should be used.

ports.outPort:
Cell 0: Path to read file (fastQ, fastA or BAM)
Cell 1 (Optional): Path to second read file (fastQ or fastA).
